attributes.action: Block inauguration of Ugandas homophobic United Nations President candidate
attributes.additional_details:
On the 11 June 2014, the UN will inaugurate a new President to it's General Assembly. Their candidate is Ugandas outwardly homophobic Sam Kutesa. He has a track record of alleged corruption and is a cabinet member of a government that has just passed one of the most extreme homophobic laws on the planet.

He is absolutely the wrong sort of person to be entrusted with a powerful role in such an impoertant institution.
